name: Create A New Account (FromAccount)
fullName: End to End/Smoke#Create A New Account (FromAccount)
description:
Generates a new account (`fromAccount`), that the funds will be transferred from, and saves the following information if the request is successful:

- Account owner from the request body (saved as collection variable `e2e_user_name_from`)
- Account id from the response body (saved as collection variable `e2e_user_account_id_from`)
descriptionHtml:
Generates a new account (`fromAccount`), that the funds will be transferred from, and saves the following information if the request is successful:

- Account owner from the request body (saved as collection variable `e2e_user_name_from`)
- Account id from the response body (saved as collection variable `e2e_user_account_id_from`)

steps.name: Should have a valid JSON format response body
Should have the required 'account' object in the response
Should have the `id` property in the account object and is a non-negative integer
